channel.title: Learner: A Documentation Builder on Learner
channel.description: Recent content in Learner: A Documentation Builder on Learner

item.title: Installation
item.description: Learner is built using the static site engineHugo and NPM. It was heavily inspired by Cupper, a Hugo theme developed by The Paciello Group. Install Hugo First you need to install Hugo globally. OSX users If you are a Mac user and have Homebrew on your system, installing Hugo is simple: brew install hugo Alternatively, you can manually install Hugo from a package. You can verify the installation was successful by typing:

item.title: The Name Of This Project/Site
item.description: This is your homepage. These are the contents of the index.md file, found in your content folder.
